video.title: The Fosters
video.synopsis: This offbeat drama charts the ups and downs of an interracial lesbian couple and their multiethnic brood of biological, adopted and foster children.

episodes.synopsis: Callie, a 16-year-old girl fresh out of juvenile hall, moves in with school vice principal Lena and her partner, Stef -- plus their blended brood.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Callie is accused of selling pills at school. Meanwhile, Lena and Stef decide not to punish Brandon, causing tension among the parents.
episodes.title: Consequently

episodes.synopsis: Mike asks Brandon to move in with him. Meanwhile, Jesus and Lexi continue to keep their relationship a secret from Mariana.
episodes.title: Hostile Acts

episodes.synopsis: As everyone celebrates Mariana's 15th birthday, the secret that Jesus has been hiding comes to light, creating tension between Mariana and Lexi.
episodes.title: Quinceanera

episodes.synopsis: While Stef and Lena try to find time to work on their relationship, Lexi and Jesus must deal with the consequences of their actions.
episodes.title: The Morning After

episodes.synopsis: Brandon has an audition with a sought-after piano coach. Meanwhile, Jesus is invited to a church camp.
episodes.title: Saturday

episodes.synopsis: Lexi's parents punish her when they learn the truth about her and Jesus.
episodes.title: The Fallout

episodes.synopsis: With Ana pressuring Mariana for more money, Jesus confronts his birth mother -- but things don't go as planned.
episodes.title: Clean

episodes.synopsis: Mariana and Jesus deal with the repercussions of their actions.
episodes.title: Vigil

episodes.synopsis: As Stef and Lena prepare to wed, Stef isn't as involved as a frazzled Lena would like. Meanwhile, Callie faces a decision in her case against Liam.
episodes.title: I Do

episodes.synopsis: The family faces the realization that Callie has run away. Mariana and Jesus spend as much time as possible with Lexi before she leaves for Honduras.
episodes.title: The Honeymoon

episodes.synopsis: Callie's fate is left in a judge's hands. Mariana joins a school play. Jesus struggles with his medication.
episodes.title: House and Home

episodes.synopsis: Callie and Brandon sneak around. Stef goes back to work, worrying Lena. Jesus joins the wrestling team. Mariana is caught in a love triangle.
episodes.title: Things Unsaid

episodes.synopsis: Callie considers applying for an apartment. Lena wonders if she can still have a baby, while Stef has trouble accepting her father's apology.
episodes.title: Family Day

episodes.synopsis: Stef deals with a loss, while Callie faces a tough decision.
episodes.title: Padre

episodes.synopsis: Brandon goes to extremes to pay Mike back for the piano lessons. Stef is worried about having to testify.
episodes.title: Us Against the World

episodes.synopsis: Callie takes pictures of other foster kids to help get them homes.
episodes.title: Kids in the Hall

episodes.synopsis: Lexi visits Jesus by surprise. Stef and Lena decide on a sperm donor.
episodes.title: Escapes and Reversals

episodes.synopsis: Callie visits her father to see if he will sign away his parental rights so she and Jude can be adopted. Mariana meets Zac's mother.
episodes.title: Don't Let Go

episodes.synopsis: Ana gives Stef an ultimatum. Wyatt comes back to town. Callie is the butt of a school prank.
episodes.title: Metropolis

episodes.synopsis: Callie and Jude find out the truth about Donald. Vico seeks revenge against Brandon.
episodes.title: Adoption Day

episodes.synopsis: Callie makes a revelation about her dad, Brandon is tormented by his guilty conscience after sleeping with Dani, and Stef becomes suspicious of Mike.
episodes.title: Things Unknown

episodes.synopsis: As Brandon struggles with a major decision, Stef confronts Mike about his whereabouts the night Ana disappeared.
episodes.title: Take Me Out

episodes.synopsis: While Lena hopes to reconnect with Stef on their weekend "babymoon," the kids throw a house party that gets out of hand.
episodes.title: Play

episodes.synopsis: Callie meets her half sister to address the roadblocks to her adoption, Timothy starts a legal battle, and Lena vies for the principal's job.
episodes.title: Say Something

episodes.synopsis: Callie worries about how her actions have impacted Jude, Stef considers moving forward with an investigation, and Emma second-guesses her breakup.
episodes.title: Truth Be Told

episodes.synopsis: Tragedy strikes when Lena learns about a medical issue affecting her pregnancy. Stef confronts Mike about Ana, while Wyatt seeks relationship advice.
episodes.title: Mother

episodes.synopsis: Brandon reveals a big secret, Jesus feels pressured to prove his loyalty to Hayley, and Callie brings Jude on a visit with the Quinns.
episodes.title: The Longest Day

episodes.synopsis: Callie returns to Girls United, her old foster group home; Mariana and Hayley prepare a double-date dinner with Mat and Jesus.
episodes.title: Girls Reunited

episodes.synopsis: The children attend a Mexican street festival, Callie struggles to control her panic attacks, and Ana wants to make amends with the twins.
episodes.title: Leaky Faucets

episodes.synopsis: Callie asks her biological father for a favor, but a betrayal threatens to derail their new bond. Connor is pressured to end his friendship with Jude.
episodes.title: Someone's Little Sister

episodes.synopsis: Brandon recalls the previous family Christmas, when the Fosters took in Callie and Jude, while guilt-ridden Jude overcompensates with Callie.
episodes.title: Christmas Past

episodes.synopsis: While Stef and Lena take opposing positions on several issues, Callie continues to fume over Robert's refusal to sign her abandonment papers.
episodes.title: Over/Under

episodes.synopsis: Callie is asked to intercede on behalf of troubled foster child Kiara, while Mariana is invited to participate in a major academic competition.
episodes.title: Stay

episodes.synopsis: During a family camping trip, Jesus reveals a big secret, Brandon and Callie attempt to move on, and Jude seethes over how he is being treated.
episodes.title: Mother Nature

episodes.synopsis: Callie struggles to connect with Robert, while Brandon tries to persuade Stef to let him go on the band tour. Jude and Connor double-date together.
episodes.title: Light of Day

episodes.synopsis: Brandon's band lands in hot water when a new gig turns out to be a dodgy "pharm" party. Jesus, meanwhile, is offered a spot at a top wrestling school.
episodes.title: If You Only Knew

episodes.synopsis: Callie informs Jude she's moving in with Robert while keeping a secret from Stef and Lena. Mariana finds a new way to recruit dancers for her team.
episodes.title: The Silence She Keeps

episodes.synopsis: As Callie prepares to move, Mariana organizes a student protest to distract from the family drama, and Jude grills Connor about their relationship.
episodes.title: Now Hear This

episodes.synopsis: Stef and Lena devise a new plan to adopt Callie, but keep the riskier details secret, while Jude is disciplined for sneaking out to be with Connor.
episodes.title: Justify the Means

episodes.synopsis: Callie faces an uncertain future after learning that Liam stole her identity in a scam, while Jude's life is turned inside out after Connor is shot.
episodes.title: Not That Kind of Girl

episodes.synopsis: Robert and Callie reach a crucial agreement in their relationship, while Jude tells Lena the truth about Connor and his fight with Connor's dad.
episodes.title: The End of the Beginning
